testcase.name: Employee should see all the information related to the customers.
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to the home page and log in.................................passed Then User clicks on My Operations field.....................................passed Then User clicks on Manage Customers field..................................passed Given User checks the First Name............................................passed And User checks the Last Name...............................................passed And User checks the Middle Initial..........................................passed And User checks the Email...................................................passed And User checks the Mobile Phone Number.....................................passed And User checks the Phone Number............................................passed And User checks the Address.................................................passed And User checks the Create Date.............................................passed
